panels.description: Shows the summary of various ovs versions and number of nodes having a specific OVS version

panels.description: Shows summary of various Interface's network driver versions with number of interfaces having that specific version

panels.description: Shows summary of various Firmware version of the network adapter and number of interfaces having that specific versions
panels.title: INTERFACE FIRMWARE VERSION

panels.title: Memory Utilization (TOP K)

panels.description: Rate of number of times a netdev was added as a port from the dpif
panels.title: PORT ACTION ADD RATE (TOP K)

panels.description: Rate of number of times a netdev was removed as a port from the dpif
panels.title: PORT ACTION DEL RATE (TOP K)

panels.description: rate of number of times the translated OpenFlow actions into a datapath actions were too big for a netlink attribute
panels.title: DP ACTION OVERSIZED RATE ( TOP K )

panels.description: Rate of number of times flows were retrived from the datapath (Linux kernel datapath module)
panels.title: DP OPEN FLOW GET RATE ( TOP K)

panels.description: Rate of number of times flows were added to the datapath (Linux kernel datapath module)
panels.title: DP OPEN FLOW PUT RATE (TOP K)

panels.description: Rate of number of times flows were deleted from the datapath (Linux kernel datapath module)
panels.title: DP OPEN FLOW DEL RATE ( TOP K)

panels.description: Rate of OpenFlow actions were translated into datapath actions
panels.title: TRANSLATION ACTIONS RATE (TOP K)

panels.description: Rate of netlink messages sent/received by the kernel
panels.title: NETLINK I/O RATE (TOP K AVG)

panels.description: Specifies the number of messages that have been sent to the underlying virtual connection (unix, tcp, or ssl) to OpenFlow devices, or queued  because it couldnâ€™t be sent using the underlying virtual connection to OpenFlow devices.
panels.title: RCONN SENT/QUEUED (TOP K)

panels.description: Specifies the rate of the OVSDB transaction has successfully completed
panels.title: TXN SUCCESS RATE (TOP K)

panels.description: Number of abnormal transactions
panels.title: ABNORMAL TRANSACTIONS

panels.description: Specifies the number of messages sent to/received from the OpenFlow Device
panels.title: VCONN I/O RATE (TOP K)

panels.description: Number of messages that have been dropped causing by flushed queue when reconnecting or queue overflow.
panels.title: ABNORMAL CONNECTIONS

panels.description: Shows how many JSON RPC requests actually processed
panels.title: JSONRPC DETAILS (TOP K)

panels.description: TOP K of ovsdb-server process CPU usage
panels.title: CPU Utilization Rate (TOP K)

panels.description: TOP K of ovsdb-server process RSS memory

panels.description: Represents the total number of packets datapath processed which is the sum of â€œhitâ€ and â€œmissedâ€
panels.title: DP PACKETS RATE (TOP K)

panels.description: Represents the number of ports connected to the datapath
panels.title: PORTS CONNECTED (TOP K)

panels.description: Represents the average number of masks visited per packet
panels.title: MASKS HIT RATIO (TOP K)

panels.description: Represents the number of flows in datapath.
panels.title: TOTAL DP FLOWS (TOP K)

panels.description: Represents the number of masks in a datapath
panels.title: MASKS (TOP K)

panels.description: Represents the number of times flows were deleted after revalidation determined to delete the flow
panels.title: upcall_flow_del_rev (TOP K)

panels.description: Represents the number of times flows were deleted because the flow didn't have min-revalidator-pps fulfilled
panels.title: upcall_flow_del_no_rev (TOP K)

panels.description: Represents the number of times flows were deleted because we reached the limit or flow was idle for more than max-idle time
panels.title: upcall_flow_del_idle_or_limit (TOP K)

panels.description: Represents the number of times missed datapath flows had to be revalidated
panels.title: revalidate_missed_dp_flow (TOP K)

panels.description: Total number of OpenFlow flows on the OVS bridge
panels.title: TOTAL BRIDGE FLOWS (TOP K)

panels.title: BRIDGE PORTS (TOP K)

panels.description: Rate of total number of OpenFlow flows on the OVS bridge
panels.title: TOTAL BRIDGE FLOWS RATE (TOP K)

panels.description: Represents rate of number of times Open vSwitch has observed the link_state of OVS interface change.
panels.title: LINK RESETS RATE (TOP K)

panels.description: Represents rate of number of collisions on interfaces
panels.title: COLLISIONS RATE (TOP K)

panels.description: Represents rate of RX overrun errors
panels.title: OVERRUN ERRORS RATE (TOP K)

panels.description: Represents rate of frame errors
panels.title: FRAME ERRORS RATE (TOP K)

panels.description: Represents rate of CRC errors

panels.description: Represents total received/transmitted bytes by OVS interface.

panels.title: PACKET I/O ERROR  RATE (TOP 10)

panels.description: Rate of dropped received/transmitted packets by OVS interface.
panels.title: PACKET I/O DROPPED RATE (TOP K)

panels.description: Rate of number of new connection packets dropped on the interface backed by VF
panels.title: VF MISSPKTS DROP RATE (TOP K)

panels.description: Top K interfaces that sends greater then 100KB of data per second averaging over 15min interval
panels.title: TOP K SW BUSY RATE (BYTES)

panels.title: TOP K SW BUSY RATE (BYTES)
